about.title: About Us
about.description: Brisbane Badminton is dedicated to providing the best badminton experience in Queensland. Our club welcomes players of all ages and skill levels, offering world-class facilities, professional coaching, and a vibrant community.

features.title: Premium Courts
features.description: Enjoy playing on courts with soft cushion flooring, professional lighting, and the highest ceiling in Queensland.

features.title: Expert Coaching
features.description: Our certified coaches help you improve your game, whether you’re a beginner or a competitive player.

features.title: Community Events
features.description: Participate in tournaments, socials, and events for all ages and abilities.
